title: Washington region mourns with Israel, calls for peace
description: In houses of worship, congregants grieved. In front of the White House, pro-Palestinian demonstrators called for the end of U.S. aid to Israel.

title: Grief and anger in southern Israel as fight against militants continues
description: Clashes between militants and Israeli forces continued across the south Sunday, even as authorities sought to reassure the public that the worst of the danger had passed.

title: Americans, other foreign nationals feared dead in Israel
description: “We have reports that several Americans were killed,” Secretary of State Antony Blinken said. A half-dozen other nations are working to verify similar reports.

title: As false war information spreads on X, Musk promotes unvetted accounts
description: Elon Musk recommended that users follow accounts that have promoted lies in the past.

title: Biden hoped for a quiet Middle East. So much for that.
description: The Biden administration has tried to keep vexing Middle East conflicts at arm’s length. But the Israeli-Palestinian conflict has reasserted itself, and U.S. hopes for a Saudi-Israel normalization are fading too.

title: How a night of dancing and revelry in Israel turned into a massacre
description: A trance music festival was one of the first targets for Hamas militants as they launched their attack on Israel, shooting into the crowd and grabbing hostages.

title: Gaza reels from Israeli airstrikes and braces for all-out war
description: “To all civilians in Gaza, I say, get out of there,” Netanyahu said in a speech late Saturday. But there is no way out for Gaza’s 2 million people.

title: Israel formally declares war against Hamas as hundreds killed on both sides
description: Hezbollah and Israel traded fire on the northern border adding a dangerous new element to the multi-pronged attack as fighting continues in the south.

title: European, U.S. cities boost security after celebrations of attack on Israel
description: Police in New York City, London and others are increasing patrols for Jewish communities after footage showed some people celebrating Hamas’s attack on Israel.

title: Earthquake devastates western Afghanistan, killing over 2,000
description: Around 10,000 people were injured, according to the Taliban-run government, and many are still trapped under the rubble.

title: Videos show how Hamas achieved its unprecedented surprise attack on Israel
description: Militants entered Israel at half a dozen locations, videos verified by The Post show.

title: Live updates: Netanyahu warns of long, difficult war as Israel retaliates after Hamas attack
description: Violence in the region continued overnight as Israeli forces responded to the unprecedented land, air and sea attacks. Nearly 500 people have been killed on both sides.

title: As partners in Ukraine’s fight for survival, two generals forged a bond
description: Over 19 months, Ukraine’s top military officer, Gen. Valery Zaluzhny, and his U.S. counterpart, Gen. Mark A. Milley, spent hours discussing the war.

title: Why Israeli raids on al-Aqsa Mosque are stoking tensions
description: The Temple Mount or al-Aqsa Mosque compound lies at the heart of the struggle between Israelis and Palestinians over Jerusalem. Israeli forces raided the site during Ramadan.
